summary: A comprehensive suite of integration tests that exercise Conan's lockfile system under a wide range of scenarios, including CI workflows, overrides, revisions, compatibility across Conan versions, package aliases, build and Python requirements, options, and user/channel overrides. The tests verify correct generation, merging, updating, and consumption of lockfiles to ensure deterministic and reproducible package builds.
business_intent: Validate and guarantee the reliability of Conan's lockfile mechanism so that developers can depend on consistent, reproducible builds and accurate dependency resolution across different environments, configurations, and Conan releases.
